website_summaries.verdict: For a nice package that comes with everything you need, this is a convenient, quality choice.
pros: The solvent and the glue are made to go together and work well together
Easy on the skin and easy to remove
Comes with an eyebrow stencil kit
Can perform well in the humidity
cons: Lasts only a couple of days

customer_reviews.title: Two good products out of three
customer_reviews.text: Removing solvent is great. Scalp protector is ok. The glue leaves something to be desired. It’s just goopy. Stringy when putting on, so difficult. Holds great for a day, and then it’s just gooie goop. Doesn’t work with concealer ever, just makes it stand out more and look bad. Going to keep the other products so not a total loss, but I will continue looking for the adhesive that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: OMG. Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: My wig has never felt so secure. I have alopica and HAVE to wear wigs. This is the first time I’ve ever used wig glue and it’s great and comes off so easy with the solvent. Make sure to wash your sinthetic wig after, oils can ruin the fibers 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glue doesn't hold.
customer_reviews.text: Received this item earlier than expected. I like the glue remover and scalp protector but the glue doesn't hold well at all. I would rather use clear lash glue, seems to work better
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna

customer_reviews.title: Great but messy
customer_reviews.text: It works well for me in gluing down my wigs. I like this product. It is actually waterproof and it stays on for me until I remove it which was what I was going for. The process can be messy though which is why I give it 4 stars but other than that, its great
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Solvent is ok. Glue is gooey and messy to work with but sticks ok. Overall i would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality products!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and great product. Love the free gift a!so. Will do business with this seller again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: S. Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This little kit is great. All works very well together, does not irritate the skin, and comes off easily. Kept my lace front on all night in the rain, even w me changing hair-dos. haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This glue was received with a little doubt but after applying it the result was appreciated. Good product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Polycart

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for me
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was sticky and awful to use and strong smelling of orange. I couldn’t figure it out at all and had a miserable experience. Maybe that’s because I don’t know what I’m doing so I don’t want to blame it on the product but I personally had a bad time
customer_reviews.author: Portia Freed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. The eyebrow stencils are useless and random though. The solvent works very well
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and doesn’t move even in humidity! Easy to remove and delivered really fast! Will buy it again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Raya

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't hold the toupee long like it says
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold the toupee long like it says. The toupee only stay on the head for 2-3 days top.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne D. Lor

customer_reviews.title: ... not used the glue yet but everything else is great so I expect it to be as well
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the glue yet but everything else is great so I expect it to be as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: OMG where to start!! Glue is tacky in bottle. Does not hold. Solvent is basically nail polish remover and since the glue doesn’t hold, you won’t need it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Good product an price
customer_reviews.text: Good deal. Glue works really well an you need the solvent to desolve glue on wig an your fore head. Easy to use an smells nice. The cleanser is alcohol an convent to use when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, great price, very fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is the best! All adhesive should come with solvent to remove it!
customer_reviews.author: MadiB

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: This kit contains everything I need to keep my lace wig on! It also had a bonus surprise of eyebrow stencils which I used right away!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't stick very long for me, not even a whole day. Maybe I didn't apply it correctly??
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: The glue is the best for holding your wig for couples of days or ...
customer_reviews.text: The glue is the best for holding your wig for couples of days or even if you used for a day .. it doesn’t show , not hard in the skin , and easy to remove with c-22 solvent ..
customer_reviews.author: Edyta

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This glue is very sticky and messy, solvent did NOT remove glue off my head, cap or wig. They’re ruined!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: scalp protector and C-22 glue remover work great. The Walker scalp protector protected my scalp from ...
customer_reviews.text: The wig glue, scalp protector and C-22 glue remover work great. The Walker scalp protector protected my scalp from the adhesive and it actually helped the Davlyn Wig adhesive stick better. I love that all my wig care items are sold together as one kit. Its very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Aramide oni

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this that is very convenient and is of high quality. I usually sweat a lot and other adhesives and kits have not worked as well as this kit. The adhesive cap has a great seal and does not leak or dry out. The kit is a great deal and value for what you are paying. They found a new customer in me and I will be back. I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: gia

product_meta.title: Lace Front Glue, Scalp Protector, Walker C22 Wig Adhesive Remover - Best Hairpiece Supply Kit For Wigs, Extensions, Toupees, and Hair Systems - Skin Safe - no Side Effects
product_meta.description:
This kit has everything you need from application to removal. If you have great hair, you want to also rock your eyebrows. BONUS: Three Queenie Eyebrow Stencils included! 

 Wig Toupee Adhesive Starter Kit - For flawless and undetectable installs and removals of lace frontals, 360 frontals, full lace wigs, lace front wigs, toupees and even lace closures. 


Wig & Hair Care Products also help improve adhesion for hot/humid weather wear, people with oily skin, sports activities that increase sweating as well as for swimming. 
Davlyn adhesive dries clear for the ultimate confidence and undetectable appearance. 
This strong adhesive is one of the best choices for long-term hold, so this tried-and-true favorite will allow you to go longer between wig removal and re-application. 
Walker Scalp Protector is a skin preparation product that helps prevent irritation from tape and adhesives. 
C-22 Solvent is excellent for cleaning and removing your lace hair system 
So add to cart now and safely and confidently jump in the pool, swim at the beach, and even go jet skiing! % Guaranteed To Keeping Your Wig/Toupee in place while you dance up a sweat on the dance floor or even go for a swim
feature_bullets: WIG GLUE - Never fear accidentally losing your wig or toupee in public again. Multipurpose clear water proof hairpiece adhesive that holds thru sweat, water, and an oily scalp. Works with lace and polyurethane bases. The 0.5 oz bottle includes built-in brush on applicator.

WALKER SCALP PROTECTOR - Ideal for a person with sensitive skin or prone to break-outs. It also helps improve adhesion for hot/humid weather wear, people with oily skin, sports activities that increase sweating as well as for swimming. prevent irritation from tape and adhesives. (1.4 FL OZ)

C-22 SOLVENT - Walker C-22 Citrus-Based Solvent is a fast acting, skin safe adhesive remover and cleaner for use on scalp, hair systems, toupees and wigs; both lace and polyurethane. C-22 is a quick and effective solvent for removing soft bond adhesives and tape residue from scalp, wig and hair system. C-22 has a strong, citrus scent; is gentle on skin and rinses off with soap and water. (4 FL OZ)
EYEBROW STENCILS - If you have great hair, you want to also rock your eyebrows. Three Queenie Eyebrow Stencils included!
100% GUARANTEED To Keeping Your Wig/Toupee in place while you dance up a sweat on the dance floor or even go for a swim.
